casebody.data:
HOOD
v.
NC DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY, et al. No. 11P16-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 17, 2016. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for NC Dept. of Public Safety. Robert Lee Hood, Badin, for Hood, Robert Lee.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of January 2016 by Plaintiff for Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of March 2016."
